dict.acceptation: 电视，电视机；电视节目；电视业；

sent.orig: The English word "television" is a mongrel because "tele" comes from Greek and "vision" from Latin.
sent.trans: 英语television是个语源混杂的词，因为tele来自希腊文，vision来自拉丁文。

sent.orig: With the mature of digital television technology, interactive television becomes developing direction of digital television.
sent.trans: 随着数字电视技术的日趋成熟，交互式电视已经成为数字电视的发展方向。

sent.orig: The station with former such as, broadcasting television station changes service center of culture broadcasting television.
sent.trans: 诸如原先的文化站、广播电视站改成文化广播电视服务中心。

sent.orig: The technology behind this may be satellite system, closed-circuit television or cable television.
sent.trans: 它所采用的技术可以是卫星系统、闭路电视或有线电视。

sent.orig: Digital Television (DTV) is the future development direction of the broadcast television system.
sent.trans: 数字电视(DTV)是未来广播电视系统的发展方向。
